position: Head of Government & Policy Affairs for Europe
goals__remit:
Aegon provides insurance, pensions and asset management in over 20 countries. The company is listed on the Amsterdam and New York stock exchanges and manages more than EUR 800 billion revenue generating investments. The group has over 30,000 employees across the globe. Its main operations are in the United States where it is one of the largest insurance companies, the Netherlands where it is headquartered and in the UK where it has a strong market position in individual and group pensions. In Central and Eastern Europe, Aegon has businesses in seven countries: the Czech Republic, Hungary, Poland, Romania, Slovakia and is also active in Turkey and Ukraine. The company also has operations in Canada, Spain, France, Ireland, Hong Kong, China, India, Indonesia, Japan, Australia, Thailand, Singapore, Mexico and Brazil.  
 
For more information, please see: http://www.aegon.com
